catalyst: The catalyst used in the experiment is 2D Fe-MNS (Fe-MOF nanosheets) functionalized with Ru(bpy)3^2 as a dye-sensitizer.
light source: A 300-W Xe lamp (Solar edge 700, set at 100 mW cm A2 ) covered with a 420 nm cut-off filter was used as a light source.
lamp: The lamp used in the experiment is a 300-W Xe lamp (Solar edge 700, set at 100 mW cm A2) covered with a 420 nm cut-off filter.
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment is a CO2-saturated solution.
operation mode: The operation mode for the experiment is not explicitly mentioned in the provided text.
